well your first lesson.. when u change your proxy settings you have to tell bash to use the new proxy settings. and the way to do that is to either source it by doing source .bashrc (if the proxy is added to your bashrc file in your homedir) or just log out and log in again
the reason it works with ssh is because ssh starts a new bash session which uses the proxy parameter
